p: Sánchez-González et al. [ 17] tested chitosan-coated packages of grapes alone or in mixture with bergamot essential oil and found chitosan mixed with bergamot oil to be the most effective to control respiration rate, water loss and antimicrobial activity during storage. Chitosan packages infused with O. vulgare essential oil also preserved the quality, physical, physiochemical and sensory attributes of grapes in storage [ 22].
